boardgame.name: Wizard Kings
boardgame.description: Wizard Kings is an exciting fantasy battle game with armies of elves, dwarves, orcs, undead, and three human armies (feudal, barbarian, amazon). Players customize their armies and fight for control of strategic cities and terrain on geomorphic maps. Wizard Kings 2nd edition is a re-release of the sold-out 1st edition._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Wizard Kings can play in as little as one hour or be used as part of a miniatures campaign for months. Victory conditions vary with the many possible scenarios. The new version is multi-player out of the box. A collectible expansion blockset has been released at the same time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Wizard Kings 2nd edition includes 4 new maps, which are compatible with existing maps from the first edition. There are many new unit types and artwork, although first edition units remain valid for play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded By:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wizard Kings: Expansion Armies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Wizard Kings: Expansion Maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Wizards Kings collection (8 armies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 8 maps) Base set played once. (Base set has Orc _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Elven army) Collection also contains: Undead Army - in shrink Dwarven Army - in shrink Chaos Mercenary Army - out of shrink, but unassembled. Ferkin (Warboar) Army - in shrink Barbarian Army - in shrink Amazon Army - in shrink Extra Maps Barrenlands (Maps #5 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; #6) Dragonia (Maps #7 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; #8)

This is the basic set of WK, including 4 maps and the Orc and Elf armies. It has been played once. All stickers are stuck on the blocks. The manual is a black _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; white photocopy (it came from Columbia like this!), but Iâ€™ll also include a full-color printout (3-hole punched) of the PDF manual available on Columbiaâ€™s website. Additionally, Iâ€™m including printouts of all the scenarios available from Columbiaâ€™s site, as well as some from a WK fan site from the internet. This game is in prime condition and ready to play right out of the box (you wonâ€™t have to spend an hour putting the stickers on â€“ Iâ€™ve done it for you!). $40 includes shipping to the continental US; contact me and we can discuss shipping costs to other locations.

*Huge* set, everything that was released and duplicate armies. Most items are brand new/, a few armies were _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;assembled_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039; (had the stickers placed on the blocks), but that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;#039;s it. Includes the base set, all armies, and maps: 1. Base set (complete, wear on rulebook), includes everything it did when new, including Elven and Orc armies and 4 maps 2. Barrenlands maps (maps #5 and 6) 3. Dragonia maps (maps #7 and 8) 4. Misty Islands maps (maps #9 and 10) 5. Azure Shore maps (maps #11 and 12) 6-10. 5 Werebeast Armies 11. Amazon Army 12-14. 3 Chaos Armies 15-16. 2 Barbarian Armies 17. Dwarven Army 18. Warboar Army 19. Undead Army Shipping within the US via insured priority mail. Note to International (non-US) buyers: I must declare actual value on all customs forms. **I will not falsify values on customs forms, no exceptions!**. For International orders, only Paypal is accepted. This same batch set listed under _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Wizard Kings_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Wizard Kings Expansion Maps_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; and _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Wizard Kings Expansion Armies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; since it contains all of the releases (is not just one of the three).

Large collection of the Wizard Kings game series. This sale includes the base set which came with the v1.0 rules set. I have also printed the 1.1 and 1.2 rules set. Races included with base set are Orcs, Undead, Dwarves and Elves. Map sheets 1 - 4 are part of base set. This also includes expansion components for the additional races of Barbarians, Amazons, Warboars, Werebeasts and Chaos Mercenaries. Also added are map sheets 5 - 12. Very complete set; included is the base game box plus some of the additional boxes to maintain the other race sets. Shipping will be added based on the zip code location of the buyer.

This is for a complete set of Wizard Kings. This includes all seven army races (Elfs, Orcs, Undead, Barbarians, Amazons, Dwarfs and Warthogs), and all 12 maps. Bought new this would cost approximately $125.00. For free I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m including both Chaos armies (Chaos and Were-beasts). I am not charging for these because I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve modified them so that any army can recruit any chaos unit, rather than having to assign the chaos units to specific armies. All the stickers have been applied and all the contents are in excellent condition. The cover for the main box has some minor taped damage. I will charge exact shipping via USPS priority plus insurance and delivery confirmation unless requested otherwise. Feel free to ask me any questions.

COMPLETE 1st edition + UNPUNCHED 2nd edition Includes: - 1st edition base game [Columbia, not Tilsit] - 2nd edition base game [unpunched/unstickered] - All 1st edition expansion armies: Ferkin, Dwarves, Amazons, Barbarians, Undead, Chaos, and Werebeasts - All 1st edition expansion maps: 1-4 with base game, 5-8 and 9-12 as expansion packs, 13-16 with 2nd ed. - 4 12mm dice in each army color [close as I could get: orange is a little dark, ferkins get ivory because brown dice are impossible to come by]; Chessex, if I recall - Comb-bound printout of scenario booklet from Columbia [one of the older editions of it], as well as 1.5 edition rules [in 1st ed. box] and 2.0 edition [in 2nd ed. box] All very lightly played [except unplayed 2nd ed. base]. All cases and boxes included. Printed out custom-made terrain guides [2.0 rules for confusing stacking / side limits]. Get this, try out the old version as it was meant to be, try out the new version before buying into the booster packs, try out a bunch of scenarios to find one you like. $195 + I cover first $5 shipping [your part is likely to be ~$10]

RESERVED FOR motorona74. ALL OTHER PURCHASES WILL BE REJECTED. This is my Wizard Kings first edition Wizard Kings. It is fully expanded with all 9 armies (two in the base game plus all seven expansion sets) and all twelve maps (four in the base game plus all eight expansion maps numbered 5 to 12). The game also contains laminated player aids, two additional sets of rules, a scenarios book, seven spare blocks plus laminated copies of the chaos and werebeast units (the original stickers are unused) to enable a more flexible approach to mercenary army creation. The slip case box shows a little shelf wear commensurate with a game of this age. With the high numbers of blocks included this game is heavy, so expect UK courier services to cost 7 GBP including signed for and insurance. I also have two sets of Victory blocks, red and blue standard sets. Remind me and I will include these free. I am pretty sure that you will be able to concoct some reasonable scenarios using the WK maps. Rules available on the Columbia Games site.
Plus these armies: Wildryn, Viksyn, Mortod, Khuyrdak, Ferkins. Includes maps 1-12, and rules version 1.6

For shipping this is considered a large to very large size game (lot includes several expansion pack cases). The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
